    • Configuration

      public Configuration​(int id)
      Create an empty configuration with a given id. This constructor is used when the configuration is downloaded from the database

  • Method Details

    • addComponent

      public boolean addComponent​(Component c)
      Add the given component to the component list only if it is compatible with the components that are already inside the configuration
      Parameters:
      c - type:Component Component that you would like to add.
      Returns:
      true if the component have been added, false if the component haven't been added or it was already added before
      See Also:
      Component

      Returns:
      true added components contains essential components
